name: dmresss

body.origin:
|- wss(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cdm(c0))
-| wceq(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cin(c1, cdm(c0)))
-| wss(cin(c1, cdm(c0)), cdm(c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ dom((c0 |` c1))⊆ dom(c0)
⊣ dom((c0 |` c1))=(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))
⊣ (c1 ⋂ dom(c0))⊆ dom(c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cdm(c0))
-| wceq(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cin(c1, cdm(c0)))
-| wss(cin(c1, cdm(c0)), cdm(c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ dom((c0 |` c1))⊆ dom(c0)
⊣ dom((c0 |` c1))=(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))
⊣ (c1 ⋂ dom(c0))⊆ dom(c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cdm(c0))
-| wss(cin(c1, cdm(c0)), cdm(c0))

comment: The domain of a restriction is a subset of the original domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
